import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import parse from "html-react-parser"; class Login extends Component { render() { let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL + "/"; return (

Sign In
To Your Account

To access your account and manage your preferences, please sign in below.

FORGOTTEN YOUR PASSWORD?
{/*

DON'T HAVE AN ACCOUNT?

Welcome! To access all the features of our platform, please create an account by clicking on the 'Register' button below

CREATE ACCOUNT
*/}

FORGET PASSWORD?

{" "} Enter you register email.

{/* additional-info */}

We want to give you 10% discount for your first order,
Use discount code at checkout

); } } export default Login;
